message.title: 2018年雨果奖颁奖，出现首位蝉联三届的得主
message.content: Don't understand the God who'd let us meet if we could never be together.When they ask me what I liked the best,I'll tell them 'It was you'.I would rather have had one breath of her hair,one kiss of her mouth,one touch of her hand than an eternity without it.I have a feeling there's something bigger out there.Bigger than we and bigger than you.I wait all day just hoping for one more minute with you.

message.title: 故宫观众破1700万人次 “80后、90后”为主力
message.content: To everything there is a season and a time to every purpose under heaven I hope you still take the time to run through the rain
